description: Reasons why an appointment was unavailable for direct scheduling.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: DIR_UNAVAIL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
List of reasons why this appointment could not have been scheduled online in Direct Scheduling.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Provider not enabled


Department not enabled


Visit type is not enabled


Provider not available for patient


Warnings overruled during scheduling


No patient scheduling access


Appointment request not sent to patient


Sequential appointments are not supported


Panel appointments are not supported


Unsupported joint appointment
